text: Gordon Lindsay Bruce (9 May 1930 - 9 January 1995) was an Australian politician. He was a Labor member of the South Australian Legislative Council from 1979 to 1993. From 1989 to 1993 he was President of the Council. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Members of the South Australian Legislative Council Category:Place of birth missing Category:Australian Labor Party members of the Parliament of South Australia Category:20th-century Australian politicians Category:Presidents of the South Australian Legislative Council
title: Gordon Bruce (politician)
